titles.title: Estate Tax Reduction Act of 2003

To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to reduce estate tax rates by 20 percent, to increase the unified credit against estate and gift taxes to the equivalent of a $2,500,000 exclusion and to provide an inflation adjustment of such amount, and for other purposes.
Estate Tax Reduction Act of 2003

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Estate Tax Reduction Act of 2003 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) reduce estate tax rates; (2) repeal the phaseout of graduated rates; and (3) increase the unified credit to $2.5 million, with an inflation adjustment.
